name: Extracellular: SpaceZone
description:
| ~ DESCRIPTION ~ |
Pilots face an endless swarm of enemy ships as they battle their way through this game. With each passing wave, the enemy ships become increasingly stronger and more difficult to defeat. But fear not, as players can earn money by destroying enemy ships and use it to purchase upgrades that will give them an edge in battle. As players progress through the game, they will face off against powerful bosses and develop their own strategies to predict and outmaneuver the enemy ships. With the ultimate goal of climbing up the leaderboard and becoming the top space pilot in the galaxy, this game offers endless hours of thrilling gameplay and non-stop action.

Get ready to blast off into infinite space battles! 

https://sites.google.com/view/ecspace/home
